Text: YOU ARE SO AWESOME Thankyou sooooo much Nepotu for the holiday bowl it is so much appreciated. Sadly UCLA got their butt spanked oh well there is always next year, Also thankyou for the other bowls you uploaded today. Have a happy new year Nepotu
